page.title: 11ANNUAL EVENTS
page.content: "Burns Night" is one of the annual events in Midmar.It is held on the 25{th}January.We talk about Robert Burns, sing songs and read his poetry. We eat haggis and when it comes in, the piper walks in front.Everyone gets a glass of whisky to wash down the haggis.Someone makes a speech called the Immortal Memory.A man gives a speech toasting the lassies and says how much we need them.After that a lassie stands up and replies to his toast and then there is dancing.Most people wear kilts.One of the most important events is the Ceilidh.We have dancing and people singing and playing violins.Some dances are called the Gay Gordons, Strip the Willow, the Eightsome Reel and the Dashing White Sergeant.At the end they play "Auld Lang Syne"
